title: Crypto Market Maker GSR Appoints Former JPMorgan Executive as Head of Trading

title: FTX abandons resurrection plans in favor of liquidation to fully repay customers affected by collapse
description:
In a significant development in the FTX bankruptcy saga, the company has decided it will not revive the exchange and will instead liquidate its assets to fully compensate customers affected by its collapse. The decision was announced by FTX’s attorney, Andy Dietderich, during the exchange’s latest bankruptcy hearing on Jan. 31. The exchange’s native token […]

The post FTX abandons resurrection plans in favor of liquidation to fully repay customers affected by collapse appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Coinbase appoints ex-UK finance minister to advisory council
description: Former U.K. Chancellor George Osborne has been appointed to Coinbase's Global Advisory Council to focus on the firm's regulatory strategy and global expansion.

title: FTX aims for full customer repayment; halts revival efforts
description: Bankrupt cryptocurrency exchange FTX is liquidating assets to repay customers, abandoning plans for a restart due to financial and legal difficulties.

title: Cardano Bulls Back in Action: ADA Price Set to Surge 15% Amid Whale Wallet Resurgence

title: Rich Dad Poor Dad Author Robert Kiyosaki Says He’ll ‘Make a Fortune’ Off His Bitcoin (BTC) Holdings – Here’s Why
description:
